metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38407 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
bgpd/bgp_label.c in FRRouting (FRR) before 8.5 attempts to read beyond theend of the stream during labeled unicast parsing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.6
frr-pythontools - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.6
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.6
frr-snmp - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.2-1ubuntu1.6').
